thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 08 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Applied Optoelectronics Reports Q1 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.11

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Applied Optoelectronics Reports Q1 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.11
text:
May 8 (Reuters) - Applied Optoelectronics Inc:
* APPLIED OPTOELECTRONICS REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS
* Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.28
* Q1 REVENUE $65.2 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $69 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.33 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES Q2 2018 REVENUE $75 MILLION TO $81 MILLION * SEES Q2 REVENUE $75 MILLION TO $81 MILLION; SEES Q2 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.39 TO $0.52
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.46, REVENUE VIEW $76.8 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
